translations: vt.<正式>重新开始，继续（resume 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: "I changed my mind," Blanche said, resuming her seat.
sentences.translation: “我改主意了，”布兰奇说，返回到她的座位上。

sentences.sentence: I am delighted for an unfortunate episode in Nigeria—Commonwealth relations will now come to an end and Nigeria is resuming its rightful place in the Commonwealth.
sentences.translation: 我对尼日利亚的一段不幸插曲感到高兴——英联邦关系现在将结束，尼日利亚正在恢复其在英联邦的合法地位。

sentences.sentence: Memory leaks when resuming from sleep mode.
sentences.translation: 从睡眠模式中唤醒后，造成内存泄露。
